**Wikipedia summary**:  
<i><b>Acer macrophyllum</b></i>, the <b>bigleaf maple</b> or <b>Oregon maple</b>, is a large deciduous tree in the genus <i>Acer</i>.
</p><p>It is native to western North America, mostly near the Pacific coast, from southernmost Alaska to southern California. Some stands are also found inland in the foothills of the Sierra Nevada of central California, and a tiny population occurs in central Idaho.</p>
